naslov: Okrug Gornji, super luksuzna i moderna vila, 395 m2 (prodaja)
Mogućnost zamjene: Nije moguća zamjena za drugu nekretninu
opis: Super luksuzna i moderna vila od pet zvjezdica na četiri etaže u Okrugu Gornjem. Novogradnja, s 395 m2 stambenog prostora, vanjskim grijanim bazenom od 24 m2 i izuzetno uređenom okućnicom od 350 m². U podrumu se nalazi prostor za rekreaciju – fitness centar, sauna, tuš i WC, te unutarnji grijani bazen. Suteren čine prostrani dnevni boravak s kuhinjom, kupaonicom, dvije spavaće sobe svaka sa svojom kupaonicom, te vrlo elegantna terasa. Prizemlje se sastoji od tri spavaće sobe, opet svaka sa svojom kupaonicom, dvije dodatne terase kao i parkirnim mjestima. Na katu je još jedna spavaća soba sa svojom kupanicom te strojarnica. U sklopu nekretnine se nalazi raskošan bazen s ležaljkama i suncobranima, roštilj, vrlo uređen vrt s vrtnim stolom i stolicama te vanjski tuš. Posjeduje brojne zidne i podne klima uređaje, podno grijanje u kupaonicama, solarne kolektore, moderan sustav video nadzora i alarma te je cjelokupno koncipirana na bazi smart-home modela. Vila se nalazi super blizu plaže u drugom redu do mora, s prekrasnim panoramskim pogledom na more i obalu. Uključuje četiri parkirna mjesta, leži uz cestu sa svom infrastrukturom i dodatnim sadržajima u blizini. Nekretnina je vrlo tražena i dolazi s uhodanim i vrlo izdašnim poslom turističkog iznajmljivanja. --- Super luxurious and modern five-star villa on four floors in Okrug Gornji. New construction, with 395 m2 of living space, outdoor heated pool of 24 m2 and a well-kept garden of 350 m2. In the basement is located a recreational area – fitness center, sauna, shower and toilet, and an indoor heated pool. The partially subterranean floor consists of a spacious living room with kitchen, bathroom, two bedrooms each with its own bathroom, and a very elegant terrace. The ground floor comprises three bedrooms, each with its own bathroom, two additional terraces and parking spaces. The first floor houses another bedroom with its own bathroom and boiler room. The property features a luxurious swimming pool with sun loungers and parasols, barbecue, very well-kept garden with a garden table and chairs and outdoor shower. The villa has numerous wall and floor air conditioning units, underfloor heating in bathrooms, solar panels, modern video surveillance and alarm system and is entirely designed on the basis of a smart-home model. The villa is located super close to the beach in the second row to the sea, with a beautiful panoramic view of the sea and the coast. It includes four parking spaces, lies along the road with all the infrastructure and additional facilities nearby. The property is in high demand and comes with a well-established and generous tourist rental business.
